Definition.WordDefinition: Mountainside, NJ (borough, FIPS 48510) Location: 40.68060 N, 74.36105 W Population (1990): 6657 (2454 housing units) Area: 10.4 sq km (land), 0.1 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 07092
mountainside n : the side or slope of a mountain; "conifer forests cover the eastern versant" [syn: {versant}]
